title: Chaos testing a Postgres cluster managed by CloudNativePG
author: Nikolay Sivko
description: Dive deep into chaos testing a PostgreSQL cluster managed by CloudNativePG on Kubernetes. Learn how to effectively test for high availability and monitor performance with Coroot. #ChaosEngineering #Postgres #Kubernetes #Observability
